data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in New Hampshire, United States a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of New Hampshire, United States
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 359,336 believers in New Hampshire, United States to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of New Hampshire against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of New Hampshire unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Moor people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in New Hampshire, United States.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of New Hampshire, United States that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Jesus, 1,360,800 people live in the state of New Hampshire. Please, give them 272 new simple churches this year.

location.name: New Hampshire
location.cities_list: Manchester, Nashua, Concord, East Concord, Derry Village
location.cities_list_w_pop: Manchester (110,229), Nashua (87,970), Concord (42,620), East Concord (42,605), Derry Village (34,539)
